channel.title: Help with porforwarding don't close this:(
channel.description:
I need help with portforwarding i got a old speedtouch 564(thomson) [old one without the game thingys] but i can't find any quides for it can someone plz help me portforwarding with this for rspv
ty, runb44

item.source: Help with porforwarding don't close this:(

item.title: Help with porforwarding don't close this:(
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You might have to edit your hosts file aswell.
To do so go to: C:/WINDOWS/system32/drivers/etc and open “hosts” with notepad.
Add this:

internal     no-ip
external     no-ip

Under this:

127.0.0.1     localhost

Replace internal with your internal ip, and external with your external ip.
For example, my hosts file would look like this:

127.0.0.1     localhost
192.168.1.1     my.no-ip.org
86.191.10.162     my.no-ip.org

I also suggest you assign a static ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with porforwarding don't close this:(
item.dc:creator: @ins3kt ins3kt
item.description:
@ins3kt wrote:

Go to your routers admin panel. Click advanced in the menu on the left, and go to NAPT.
That’s where you add/edit your ports.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with porforwarding don't close this:(
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“ShadowDD, post:2, topic:314629”][quote author=sjoukjeowns link=topic=411103.msg3032227#msg3032227 date=1258472503]
I need help with portforwarding i got a old speedtouch 564(thomson) [old one without the game thingys]
but i can’t find any quides for it can someone plz help me portforwarding with this for rspv

ty, runb44
[/quote]

RSPS* And just for your Info if your server is 564 that does not mean the portfwording is diffrent it’s the same… And all I know about the No-ip thing is Http://www.no-ip.com then make account then add host make Ip portfword go to no-ip again when ur not loged in and go to download download the progream and then check the check box next to your IP

Addtion to your Subject name… This won’t get close becuase of the Client Connection to Server so in a way this belongs here[/quote]

uhm this is old stuff i did the no-ip portforwarding is something different it’s that peaple can connect to your router…
not that your ip is set to a easyer thing (no-ip)
no-ip=turning your default gateway ip to a name thingy=not portforwarding…

Read full topic

but i can’t find any quides for it can someone plz help me portforwarding with this for rspv

RSPS* And just for your Info if your server is 564 that does not mean the portfwording is diffrent it’s the same… And all I know about the No-ip thing is Http://www.no-ip.com then make account then add host make Ip portfword go to no-ip again when ur not loged in and go to download download the progream and then check the check box next to your IP

Addtion to your Subject name… This won’t get close becuase of the Client Connection to Server so in a way this belongs here
